divs: Sighting Details 1.I was looking out the downstairs window.2.Itmooved verry quickly.3.I was unsure what it was.4.I just stared at it at itbecause even though I experienced fear26 anger i was interested because Id neverseen anything like this before.Afterwords I had strange dreams.5.It jus kind ofhoverd for a minute and thensped off.6.traveled so far i could not see it.
